title: New: Eyelid Kid – Sleeps Well On Knives
content: California’s Eyelid Kid impressed on their debut track, Time Travel, and are now back with another slice of perfectly crafted indie-pop. Sleeps Well On Knives is part Vampire Weekend, part The Shins and 100% made for festival crowds, and not only that, but really feels like the beginning of something rather special for Eyelid Kid. Check it out below, and find out a bit more about the band via a Stereogum interview.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
